scripts.coverage:report: forge coverage -vv --fork-url $(grep OPTIMISM_RPC .env | cut -d '=' -f2,3,4,5) --gas-limit 1000000000000000 --fork-block-number 126785000 --report lcov && genhtml lcov.info --rc derive_function_end_line=0 -o report --branch-coverage && rm lcov.info
scripts.deploy:base:operator-contract: forge script --use 0.8.25 scripts/deploy/DeployOperatorContract.s.sol:Deploy --rpc-url $(grep BASE_RPC .env | cut -d '=' -f2,3,4,5) --broadcast --slow -vvvv --verify --etherscan-api-key $(grep ETHERSCAN_API_KEY .env | cut -d '=' -f2)
scripts.deploy:optimism:operator-contract: forge script --use 0.8.25 scripts/deploy/DeployOperatorContract.s.sol:Deploy --rpc-url $(grep OPTIMISM_RPC .env | cut -d '=' -f2,3,4,5) --broadcast --slow -vvvv --verify --etherscan-api-key $(grep ETHERSCAN_API_KEY .env | cut -d '=' -f2)
